contents: *Supplementary Provision No. 1, 2009.04.30. , Article 1 (Enforcement Date) These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education, Science and Technology., , *Supplementary Provision No. 2, December 2, 2009. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education, Science and Technology., , *Supplementary Provision No. 3, March 22, 2010. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education, Science and Technology., , *Supplementary Provision No. 4, May 10, 2010. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education, Science and Technology., , *Supplementary Provision No. 5, January 1, 2011. , These Articles of Incorporation shall come into effect from January 1, 2011., , *Supplementary Provision No. 6, 2013.10.04. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 7, June 11, 2014. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 8, July 20, 2015. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 9, December 16, 2015. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 10, July 11, 2019. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 11, August 27, 2019. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education., , *Supplementary Provision No. 12, November 5, 2020. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force from the date of approval by the Minister of Education. However, in the case of Article 17 (2) of the revised regulations, it will come into effect from January 1, 2021., , *Supplementary Provision No. 13, May 10, 2021. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force immediately after promulgation., , *Supplementary Provisions No. 14, December 23, 2021. , These Articles of Incorporation shall enter into force immediately after promulgation., , *Supplementary Provisions No. 15, August 17, 2022. , These Articles of Incorporation shall come into effect immediately after promulgation.
